name: Ski Pro
description:
Hit the slopes!

Enjoy a skiing challenge that brings back the retro look and feel of video games from the 80's!

Play for speed or distance as you slalom around gates. Glide left and right using the accelerometer or slider. In time mode, adjust your downhill speed with a tilt of your device, balancing control vs. velocity. In distance mode, slalom around as many gates as possible until you exceed 5 seconds in penalties.

Compete with skiers around the world and earn achievements for exceeding time and distance challenges.

The mountain is calling!
